remediation: There is no fixed version for com.jfinal:jfinal .
title: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')

vulnDescription.Overview: com.jfinal:jfinal is a JFinal is a simple, light, rapid,independent, extensible Java WEB + ORM framework. The feature of JFinal looks like ruby on rails especially ActiveRecord. Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') via the navigation management department. An attacker can inject malicious scripts that may be executed in the context of the user's browser by submitting crafted input to the affected component.
